description: Add up to 2 anomaly notifications channels for a profiling group.

parameters.name: channels
parameters.description: One or 2 channels to report to when anomalies are detected. (dict) --- Notification medium for users to get alerted for events that occur in application profile. We support SNS topic as a notification channel. List of publishers for different type of events that may be detected in an application from the profile. Anomaly detection is the only event publisher in Profiler. (string) --- id (string) --- Unique identifier for each Channel in the notification configuration of a Profiling Group. A random UUID for channelId is used when adding a channel to the notification configuration if not specified in the request. Unique arn of the resource to be used for notifications. We support a valid SNS topic arn as a channel uri.

nested_params.name: eventPublishers
nested_params.description: List of publishers for different type of events that may be detected in an application from the profile. Anomaly detection is the only event publisher in Profiler.

nested_params.name: id
nested_params.description: Unique identifier for each Channel in the notification configuration of a Profiling Group. A random UUID for channelId is used when adding a channel to the notification configuration if not specified in the request.

nested_params.name: uri
nested_params.description: Unique arn of the resource to be used for notifications. We support a valid SNS topic arn as a channel uri.

parameters.name: profilingGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the profiling group that we are setting up notifications for.

nested_items.name: notificationConfiguration
nested_items.description: The new notification configuration for this profiling group.

nested_items.name: channels
nested_items.description: List of up to two channels to be used for sending notifications for events detected from the application profile.

nested_items.name: eventPublishers
nested_items.description: List of publishers for different type of events that may be detected in an application from the profile. Anomaly detection is the only event publisher in Profiler.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: Unique identifier for each Channel in the notification configuration of a Profiling Group. A random UUID for channelId is used when adding a channel to the notification configuration if not specified in the request.

nested_items.name: uri
nested_items.description: Unique arn of the resource to be used for notifications. We support a valid SNS topic arn as a channel uri.
